document_title: Acute pancreatitis: causes, symptoms, complications and diagnosis
subsection_content: Acute pancreatitis is a condition in which the pancreas becomes inflamed (swollen) suddenly over a short period of time. Acute pancreatitis can be cured, but there are also many cases of serious complications or death.(2)
subsection_title: benh viem tuy cap.json. What is acute pancreatitis?
subsection_data:
benh viem tuy cap.json. What is acute pancreatitis?
Acute pancreatitis is a condition in which the pancreas becomes inflamed (swollen) suddenly over a short period of time. Acute pancreatitis can be cured, but there are also many cases of serious complications or death.(2)
